Uses of Interface
org.jgrapes.core.Channel

  • Packages that use Channel 
    Package Description
    org.jgrapes.core
    Defines the interfaces and classes that provide the core functionality of the JGrapes event driven component framework.
    org.jgrapes.core.annotation
    Annotations used by the library.
    org.jgrapes.core.events
    Core events.
    org.jgrapes.core.internal
    Classes implementing the public API of the library.
    org.jgrapes.http
    Provides components for building a HTTP server based on the core and IO components.
    org.jgrapes.http.annotation
    Adds a special annotation for methods that handle HTTP request events.
    org.jgrapes.http.events
    Provides the events handled by the server components.
    org.jgrapes.http.freemarker
    Provides a base component for generating template based responses to HTTP requests.
    org.jgrapes.io
    I/O related components built on top of the core package.
    org.jgrapes.io.events
    Provides the events used by the I/O related components.
    org.jgrapes.io.util
    Utility classes, mainly for adapted buffers to specific needs.
    org.jgrapes.net
    Networking related I/O classes.
    org.jgrapes.util
    Utility components that are too small to deserve individual libraries/projects.
    org.jgrapes.util.events  

    • Uses of Channel in org.jgrapes.core

      Subinterfaces of Channel in org.jgrapes.core 
      Modifier and Type Interface Description
      static interface  Channel.Default
      This interface’s class can be used to specify the component’s channel (see Component.channel()) as criterion in handler annotations.
      interface  Self
      This interface type can be used to specify the object itself as channel in handler annotations.
      interface  Subchannel
      Represents a subchannel.
      Classes in org.jgrapes.core that implement Channel 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  ClassChannel
      This class is the root base class for channels that use their class (type) as value for matching (see Eligible).
      class  Component
      This class can be used as base class for implementing a component.
      class  ComponentCollector<F extends ComponentFactory>
      A component that collects all component factory services of a given type and creates an instance of each.
      class  NamedChannel
      This class provides channels that are identified by a name (string).
      static class  Subchannel.DefaultSubchannel
      A simple implementation of Subchannel.
      Fields in org.jgrapes.core declared as Channel 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      static Channel Channel.BROADCAST
      A special channel instance that can be used to send events to all components.
      static Channel Channel.SELF
      A special channel object that can be passed as argument to the constructor of Component(Channel).
      Methods in org.jgrapes.core with type parameters of type Channel 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      <E extends EventBase<?>,​C extends Channel>
      void      		 Event.forChannels​(Class<C> type, BiConsumer<E,​C> handler)
      Execute the given handler for all channels of the given type.
      Methods in org.jgrapes.core that return Channel 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      Channel Component.channel()
      Returns the channel associated with the component.
      Channel Manager.channel()
      Returns the channel of the component managed by this manager.
      Channel[] Event.channels()
      Returns the channels associated with the event.
      Channel Subchannel.DefaultSubchannel.mainChannel()  
      Channel Subchannel.mainChannel()
      Returns the main channel.
      Methods in org.jgrapes.core with parameters of type Channel 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      default ComponentType ComponentFactory.create​(Channel componentChannel)
      Creates a new component with its channel set to the given channel.
      Optional<ComponentType> ComponentFactory.create​(Channel componentChannel, Map<Object,​Object> properties)
      Creates a new component with its channel set to the given channel using the given additional properties.
      <T extends Event<?>>
      T      		 EventPipeline.fire​(T event, Channel... channels)
      Add an event to be sent to components listening for such events on the given channels to the end of the queue.
      <T> Event<T> Manager.fire​(Event<T> event, Channel... channels)
      Fires the given event on the given channel.
      static Manager Components.manager​(ComponentType component, Channel componentChannel)
      Returns a component’s manager like Components.manager(ComponentType).
      Event<T> Event.setChannels​(Channel... channels)
      Sets the channels that the event is fired on if no channels are specified explicitly when firing the event (see Manager.fire(Event, Channel...)).
      static String Channel.toString​(Channel channel)
      Returns a textual representation of a channel.
      static String Channel.toString​(Channel[] channels)
      Returns a textual representation of an array of channels.
      Constructors in org.jgrapes.core with parameters of type Channel 
      Constructor Description
      CompletionEvent​(T monitoredEvent, Channel... channels)
      Instantiates a new completion event.
      Component​(Channel componentChannel)
      Creates a new component base with its channel set to the given channel.
      Component​(Channel componentChannel, HandlerDefinition.ChannelReplacements channelReplacements)
      Creates a new component base like Component(Channel) but with channel mappings for Handler annotations.
      ComponentCollector​(Class<F> factoryClass, Channel componentChannel)
      Utility constructor that uses each factory to create a single instance, using an empty map as properties.
      ComponentCollector​(Class<F> factoryClass, Channel componentChannel, Function<String,​List<Map<Object,​Object>>> matcher)
      Creates a new collector that collects the factories of the given type and uses each to create an instance with this component’s channel.
      DefaultSubchannel​(Channel mainChannel)
      Creates a new instance with the given main channel and response pipeline.
      Event​(Channel... channels)
      Creates a new event.

    • Uses of Channel in org.jgrapes.http

      Classes in org.jgrapes.http that implement Channel 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  HttpConnector
      A converter component that receives and sends web application layer messages and byte buffers on associated network channels.
      class  HttpServer
      A converter component that receives and sends byte buffers on a network channel and web application layer messages on IOSubchannels of its channel.
      class  InMemorySessionManager
      A in memory session manager.
      class  LanguageSelector
      A component that attempts to derive information about language preferences from requests in the specified scope (usually “/”) and make them available as a LanguageSelector.Selection object associated with the request event using Selection.class as association identifier.
      class  SessionManager
      A base class for session managers.
      class  StaticContentDispatcher
      A dispatcher for requests for static content, usually files.
      Constructors in org.jgrapes.http with parameters of type Channel 
      Constructor Description
      HttpConnector​(Channel appChannel, Channel networkChannel)
      Create a new connector that uses the networkChannel for network level I/O.
      HttpServer​(Channel appChannel, InetSocketAddress serverAddress, Class<? extends Request.In>... fallbacks)
      Create a new server that creates its own TcpServer with the given address and uses it for network level I/O.
      HttpServer​(Channel appChannel, Channel networkChannel, Class<? extends Request.In>... fallbacks)
      Create a new server that uses the networkChannel for network level I/O.
      InMemorySessionManager​(Channel componentChannel)
      Creates a new session manager with its channel set to the given channel and the path to “/”.
      InMemorySessionManager​(Channel componentChannel, String path)
      Creates a new session manager with the given channel and path.
      InMemorySessionManager​(Channel componentChannel, String pattern, int priority, String path)
      Creates a new session manager using the given channel and path.
      LanguageSelector​(Channel componentChannel)
      Creates a new language selector component with its channel set to the given channel and the scope to “/”.
      LanguageSelector​(Channel componentChannel, String scope)
      Creates a new language selector component with its channel set to the given channel and the scope to the given scope.
      SessionManager​(Channel componentChannel)
      Creates a new session manager with its channel set to the given channel and the path to “/”.
      SessionManager​(Channel componentChannel, String path)
      Creates a new session manager with the given channel and path.
      SessionManager​(Channel componentChannel, String pattern, int priority, String path)
      Creates a new session manager using the given channel and path.
      StaticContentDispatcher​(Channel componentChannel, String resourcePattern, URI contentRoot)
      Creates new dispatcher that tries to fulfill requests matching the given resource pattern from the given content root.

    • Uses of Channel in org.jgrapes.io

      Subinterfaces of Channel in org.jgrapes.io 
      Modifier and Type Interface Description
      interface  IOSubchannel
      Represents a subchannel for grouping input and output events related to an I/O resource such as an opened file or a network connection.
      Classes in org.jgrapes.io that implement Channel 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  FileStorage
      A component that reads from or writes to a file.
      class  InputStreamMonitor
      A component that watches for new input on an InputStream.
      static class  IOSubchannel.DefaultIOSubchannel
      A simple implementation of IOSubchannel.
      class  NioDispatcher
      A helper component that provides the central hub for non blocking I/O components.
      class  PurgeTerminator
      A component that handles Purge events by unconditionally firing a Close events as response.
      Methods in org.jgrapes.io with parameters of type Channel 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void FileStorage.onClose​(Close event, Channel channel)
      Handle close by closing the file associated with the channel.
      void FileStorage.onInput​(Input<ByteBuffer> event, Channel channel)
      Handle input by writing it to the file, if a channel exists.
      void FileStorage.onOutput​(Output<ByteBuffer> event, Channel channel)
      Handle Output events by writing them to the file, if a channel exists.
      Constructors in org.jgrapes.io with parameters of type Channel 
      Constructor Description
      DefaultIOSubchannel​(Channel mainChannel, EventPipeline responsePipeline)
      Creates a new instance with the given main channel and response pipeline.
      FileStorage​(Channel channel)
      Create a new instance using the default buffer size of 8192.
      FileStorage​(Channel channel, int bufferSize)
      Create a new instance using the given size for the read buffers.
      InputStreamMonitor​(Channel componentChannel, InputStream input)
      Creates a new input stream monitor with its channel set to the given channel.
      InputStreamMonitor​(Channel componentChannel, InputStream input, Channel dataChannel)
      Creates a new input stream monitor with its channel set to the given channel.
      PurgeTerminator​(Channel componentChannel)

    • Uses of Channel in org.jgrapes.net

      Subinterfaces of Channel in org.jgrapes.net 
      Modifier and Type Interface Description
      interface  TcpChannel
      A special sub channel used for TCP connections.
      Classes in org.jgrapes.net that implement Channel 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  SslCodec
      A component that receives and sends byte buffers on an encrypted channel and sends and receives the corresponding decrypted data on a plain channel.
      class  TcpConnectionManager
      Provides a base class for the TcpServer and the TcpConnector.
      protected class  TcpConnectionManager.TcpChannelImpl
      The internal representation of a connection.
      class  TcpConnector
      A component that reads from or write to a TCP connection.
      class  TcpServer
      Provides a TCP server.
      Constructors in org.jgrapes.net with parameters of type Channel 
      Constructor Description
      SslCodec​(Channel plainChannel, Channel encryptedChannel, boolean dontValidate)
      Creates a new codec to be used as client.
      SslCodec​(Channel plainChannel, Channel encryptedChannel, SSLContext sslContext)
      Creates a new codec that uses the given SSLContext.
      TcpConnectionManager​(Channel componentChannel)
      Creates a new server using the given channel.
      TcpConnector​(Channel channel)
      Create a new instance using the given channel.
      TcpServer​(Channel componentChannel)
      Creates a new server using the given channel.

      This component provides a store for an application’s configuration backed by the Java Preferences.
